title: Achieving optimal balance: tuning electrical and optical characteristics of carbon electrodes for emerging photovoltaics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15571-15581
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01797H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Amir Shehzad Gul, Muhammad Noman, Qandeel Rehman, Aimal Daud Khan, Muhammad Saad Rehan, Shayan Tariq Jan, Adnan Daud Khan
This study pioneers a cost-effective, eco-friendly, scalable spray-coating technique for producing transparent & conductive electrodes with impressive electrical & optical performance, poised to boost the efficiency & stability of next-generation PV.
